title: After The Storm
description: "You are still legally my wife," Rad pointed out bluntly. "All I'm asking is that you resume those duties once more."Lainie stared at him. What a fool she had been not to accept his previous offer. But that refusal had been dictated by her pride, and now need had replaced pride.What frightened Lainie was that she still loved him. She was beginning to wonder if she had ever stopped!
author: Janet Dailey
